address-selection--input-label: Does the beneficiary have the same mailing address as one previously entered in this form?
beneficiary--address-change-label: Has the beneficiary’s mailing address changed since their last CHAMPVA claim or benefits application submission?
beneficiary--address-change-hint: Any updates you make here will only apply to your CHAMPVA benefits. We won’t update your address in your VA.gov profile.
beneficiary--basic-info-desc: Enter the name exactly as it’s listed on the beneficiary’s CHAMPVA identification card.
beneficiary--contact-info-desc: We’ll use this information to contact the beneficiary if we have any questions.
beneficiary--mailing-address-desc: We’ll send any important information about this claim to this address.
beneficiary--member-number-hint: This number is usually the same as the beneficiary’s Social Security number.
breadcrumb--health-benefits: Health and disability benefits for family and caregivers
certifier--claim-status-label: Is this a new claim or a resubmission for an existing claim?
certifier--claim-status-option--resubmis: A resubmission for an existing claim
claim--auto-title: Claim relationship to a car accident
claim--auto-label: Is this a claim for an injury or condition caused by a car accident?
claim--auto-hint: Depending on your answer, we may contact the beneficiary’s auto insurance provider to determine if they paid any amount for this care.
claim--eob-title: Upload explanation of benefits for this claim from
claim--prescription-title: Upload supporting document for prescription medication claim
claim--work-label: Is this a claim for a work-related injury or condition?
claim--work-hint: Depending on your answer, we may contact the beneficiary’s workers’ compensation insurance provider to determine if they paid any amount for this care.
form-label--address-military: Address is on military base outside of the United States.
form-messages--no-auth: Please sign in again to continue your CHAMPVA claim.
form-messages--not-found: Please start over to file a CHAMPVA claim.
health-insurance--cancel-add-description: If you cancel adding this health insurance plan, we won’t save its information. You’ll return to a screen where you can add or remove other health insurance plans.
health-insurance--cancel-edit-descriptio: If you cancel editing this health insurance plan, we won’t save its information. You’ll return to a screen where you can add or remove other health insurance plans.
health-insurance--delete-item-descriptio: This will delete %s and all the information from your list of other health insurance plans.
health-insurance--delete-noun-descriptio: This will delete this %s and all the information from your list of other health insurance plans.
health-insurance--intro-desc: Next we’ll ask you to enter information about the beneficiary’s Medicare and other health insurance. We need this information to process your CHAMPVA claim.
health-insurance--type-label--medicare: Medicare Part A or B (hospital and medical insurance)
health-insurance--yes-no-label: Does the beneficiary have health insurance other than CHAMPVA to add to this claim?
health-insurance--yes-no-label-more: Does the beneficiary have any other health insurance coverage that isn’t through CHAMPVA?
health-insurance--yes-no-hint: This includes any coverage through a family member, health insurance from an employer, Medicare, and supplemental or secondary insurance.
resubmission-docs-upload--page-title: Upload supporting documents for your claim
resubmission-id-number--page-desc: We’ll use the Program Document Identifier (PDI) or control number to identify the original claim that was submitted. These can be found on the letter you received from CHAMPVA requesting further action on your claim.
resubmission-id-number--select-label: Is this a PDI number or control number?
sip-messages--expired: Your saved CHAMPVA claim (10-7959A) has expired. If you want to file a CHAMPVA claim, please start a new form.
sip-messages--in-progress: Your CHAMPVA claim (10-7959A) is in progress.
sip-messages--saved: Your CHAMPVA claim has been saved.
statement-of-truth--body-text: I confirm that the identifying information in this form is accurate and has been represented correctly.
veteran--name-desc: Enter the Veteran’s name. We’ll use this information to confirm eligibility.
veteran--mailing-address-desc: We’ll send any important information about this application to your address.
veteran--contact-info-desc: We may contact you if we have more questions about this claim.
